name: Soliderio
description:
Enter a world where everyone wants to kill! You are the simple man, defeat the oncoming waves of evil.
Stack up with powerful items. Fight enemies and bosses to get items and levels for powerful skills.

Key Features:
• Unique skills to help you defeat enemies.
• Explore beautiful worlds.
• Lots of items.
• Random item drop.
• Marge EQ
• Enchant EQ
• Level-up and equip yourself with powerful equipment to increase your stats.
• AutoMovement
• AutoAttack
• Wolf 
• More comming soon !

Any criticism or ideas are welcome!:)
